nima wimak nomathi wairaya sasara pura minisa pasupasa emin ohu dukkha dayaka bawata pathkarayi.budurajanan wahanse mema gathawa deshana karanu labuye buddha kalayehidi athiwunu kisiyam siddhiyak mulkaragena podu minis sithehi awalakshana swabhawaya saha ema anek pakshaya pilibandawaya.anek pakshaya yanu wairi sahagatha nathi upashantha minis sitha pilibandawaya.
mehidi ohu ewakata non teknikal katayuthu sandaha bhawithaye thibunu sinhala wachanath, eewa nathi thana aluthin ohu thanu wachanath yodaganna athi.
eya adath ethana ma pawathiyi.

me jathiya,me uthum budu dahama thawa duratath raka gena idiriyatama gena yayuthu nam sathyaya rajakarana boruwata ida nodena minisunge hitha niwan dahamak deshana karana muniwarayan wahansela wata aadhyathmika shakthiya ekkasu kirima awashyayenma kala yuthuwe.

kurunagala disthrikkaye magalle wawe ron mada iwath kirime wada katayuthu da aarambha wi thibena athara bathalagoda wawa ha poshitha ala, ee yatathe athi kuda waw, kuda saha kanthoruwa yana wawwalada ron mada iwath kere.haniyata path waga bimwalata biththara wi saha pohora labadima saha bim sakasima yanadiya sandaha awashya aadhara laba dima sandaha haniyata path pradesha, waga palu wu gowin, idam pramana aadi mulika thorathuru aadala kshethra niladharin mangin me wana wita ras kara gena atha.ee anuwa 2012/2013 maha kannaye niyangayen haniyata path pradesha sandaha awashya biththara wi awashyathawaya busal 180,000k pamana wana athara ee sandaha awashya mudal prathipadana rupiyal miliyana 216k krushikarma amathyanshayata labadimata niyamithaya.mema wadasatahana mudal ha krama sampadana amathyanshaye lekamwarayage pradhanathwayen saha adala amathyansha lekamwarungen samanwitha janadhipathi karya sadhaka balakayak nirikshanaya kara ehi pragathiya dina 10kata warak samalochanaya kirimata niyamithaya..
tarhan penwa dunne isthanbul prawahanaye pradhana gataluwa wanne pasugiya 70 warshaya thula 3-4 mahala ihala gos thibiyadith, 12 thattuwata wada nagaraye janagahanaya wadiwima bawayi.

aya wedi thabagath bawa polisiya kiyayi. 37 hawiridi mindi meyata perada siyadiwi nasaganimata uthsaha kara atha.

wisheshayenma petroliyam aashritha nishpadanayak lesa ganena plastik haraha aaharawalata ha jalayata hanikara wisha rasayana musuwima haraha pilika, sthri/purusha wandabhawaya, gabsawim, angawikala daru upath menma aduma wani rogi thaththwayanda athiwiya haki bawa widyathmaka parikshana haraha thahawuru wi athayida ee mahatha sadahan kara sitiyeya.

wisheshayenma mathura kala budu pilimawalata mehi wisheshathwayak atha.
mehidi rohal, pasal, thapal sewa, prawahana sewa, dumriya, banku saha welendapala pahasukam da anekuth siwil janathawata awashya rajya pahasukam da sapayiya yuthu weyi.

enam, wiplawawadi sudanama athi kara ganime kriyakarithwaye sita balaya sandaha kshanika aragalayata pariwarthanaya wime di paksha arbudayak pana nagima aniwarya ya yanna yi. 27 meya ese wanne mandayi pahadili karamin ohu thawaduratath mese liyayi: pakshayaka wardhanaye sama kala parichchedayaka di ma pakshayakata thamange ma wishesha lakshana pawathina athara, ehi sama kala parichchedayakata suwishesha purudu ha wada widhi awashya ya.

kese wethath rajapakshawadi madhyayanta mema prakashaya ranathungawa osawa parasakwala gasimata tharam garhitha,deshadrohi prakashayak wuyeya.yam heyakin mema prakashaya ranathunga nowana - wishrama giya wenath kawara kridakayeku sidukalath merata madhyayanta eya prashnayak wiya nohakiwa thibuni.mehidi thiranathmaka wuye ranathunga hudu hitapu kridakayeku wima nowa wipaksha deshapalakayeku wimayi.big bradar oba desa ukusu asin bala siti.ebadu rajyayaka sithata ekagawa,swadhinawa,krikat tharagayak pilibada adahasakwath prakasha kala nohaka.oba sithiya yuththe brig badar sithana aakarayataya.hada obageya.namuth in nikmiya yuththe big bradar wisin anumatha kala adahas pamani.
